name: Station Defense
description:
The bad news: Aliens are attacking your space station.  The good news:They only come from 4 directions! 

Use the arrow keys to launch missiles to defend the stations. Destroy the rocks the aliens send. Destroy the alien ships before they disable the missile launchers. Don't destroy the supply crates used to repair the station.

Like any good arcade game, you are going to lose. The question is how long can you hold out? Can you get your score on the board? This is a retro arcade game. Every time you press the "Enter" key you can almost hear the 2 quarters tumbling down into the machine. Boop, boop, beep. Time to shoot them again!

Gameplay
